attributes.comment:
I think the increase it too much, if USCIS wants to increase it, it should be only by
a small percentage, perhaps 3%. I don't think USCIS need to increase it by that
much in order make up the costs of processing applications and fund
improvements in service, besides the service USCIS offers is terrible, the clerks
and incaplable of dealing with the public, and the wait for people to obtain any
benefit, is terribly long. It is obvious we in the USA have a broken immigration
system.

Plus, USCIS been a department of the government should ask congress for
funding from tax payers. I as a US Citizen and taxpayer feel that immigrants
should not have to cover expenses that should be paid by the goverment. Also, I
know for a fact that thousands of people submitt applications for different
immigration benefits, with an already expensive fee. USCIS should be able to
cover all the expenses they have with the money that is already bringing in.

Also, my last comment is: I HOPE THESE INCREASES ARE NOT BEEN DONE
IN ORDER TO PAY FOR THE WAR IN IRAK.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Rodolfo Nunez
